channel.title: Makemood enhancer + Bruce Jr. + Special Mission
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Makemood enhancer + Bruce Jr. + Special Mission" - Question regarding when the Mood Enhancer "Kicks In" for Hangout Requirements.

item.title: Re: Makemood enhancer + Bruce Jr. + Special Mission
item.content:encoded: someone should edit the ME deiscription to include this.

item.title: Re: Makemood enhancer + Bruce Jr. + Special Mission
item.content:encoded: It's instant. You don't have to wait for day roll.

item.title: Makemood enhancer + Bruce Jr. + Special Mission
item.content:encoded:
So, another question,

I recently managed to acquire 2 sham rocks and 2 stark moonlights and so am attempting the flash ring/freshest move series of special missions. Now I got so excited that I sorta rushed into the mission and forgot I had to hang out with Bruce Jr.

Not a problem, I have the appetite and a mood enhancer ready.

My question is this then: Does the Mood Enhancer kick in immediately, prior to the day roll so that I can continue with the special mission right away OR does the Mood Enhancer kick in after the day roll.

Thanks ahead of time for anyone who can lend a hand in clearing this up.
